snippet.title: Arena Breakout - Official Season 3 Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description: Arena Breakout is a free-to-play mobile tactical extraction first-person shooter developed by MoreFun Studios. Season 3 titled "Enter the Vault" has arrived enabling players to choose a faction to receive faction assault rifles and more new weapons like the Groza, the FAMAS assault rifle, the AUG and the Suomi submachine gun, and more. Put your skills to the test on the brand-new TV Station map equipped with tight corners to engage the newly added bosses to the game as Kurt, Rolf, and Bernard work to prevent teams from breaching the elevator that leads to a worthwhile vault. Season 3 for Arena Breakout is available now for iOS and Android.
